page.title: 02TRADE IN EASTLEIGH
page.content: Eastleigh is a thriving commercial and light industrial area.For almost 100 years the railway engineering works has been a major employer.Pirelli's have two large factories.Several new indusrial estates have been built in the last ten years. Companies using them include Hants and Dorset Bus Company, Kennedy's, Dibbens, Jewsons, Tagarts builders merchant,Roadline, National Carriers,Fersina Finch, A.T.S.Tyres, Chloride,Comet, Rowntree Mackintosh, The town has a thriving shopping centre of small shops.Tesco and Safeways have supermarkets.A market is held every Thursday.The town has its own Eastleigh Weekly News. Lloyds,National Westminster, Barclays and Midland have banks.Major local estate agents e.g.Vail, Mann & Co. Fox & Sons have offices in the town.
